articles.headline: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic
articles.description: — Zaccharie Risacher scored 21 points, Nickeil Alexander-Walker had 20 and the Atlanta Hawks beat the Orlando Magic 127-112 on Tuesday night.

images.alt: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic

articles.headline: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights
articles.description: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights

images.alt: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights

articles.headline: Dyson Daniels powers Atlanta with 18-6-6 in big win
articles.description: Dyson Daniels showcases his skills, contributing 18 points, 6 rebounds, and 6 assists in a dominant 15-point Hawks victory.

images.alt: Dyson Daniels powers Atlanta with 18-6-6 in big win

vids.description: The Thunder prevail on ring night with a hard-fought victory over the Rockets in double overtime.
vids.headline: Thunder, Rockets open NBA season with 2OT thriller

track.trackName: COM_NBA Highlight (Thunder, Rockets open NBA season with 2OT thriller) 2025/10/21 ESHEET SOTFULL

vids.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander hits the clutch free throws to win it for OKC after he was fouled by Kevin Durant.
vids.headline: KD fouls out, SGA hits game-winning free throws

track.trackName: NBA_One-Play (KD fouls out, SGA hits game-winning free throws) 2025/10/22 ESHEET

vids.description: Kevin Durant grabs the rebound and appears to signal for a timeout without any available as time expires in overtime to the protest of the Thunder.
vids.headline: KD appears to signal timeout with none left for Rockets

track.trackName: NBA_One-Play (KD appears to signal timeout with none left for Rockets) 2025/10/22 ESHEET
